Showreel.Title: SHOWREEL
Showreel.Text1: A short showreel to show what I can do and who I am.
Showreel.Text2: It's not a lot of work yet but it does give an idea of where my strenghts currently lie.
Showreel.Text3: In the comming period, I will continue to expand my gallery.

Hello.Title: HELLO
Hello.SubTitle: My name is Ryan
Hello.Text1: I am a 20 year old 3D digital designer from the Netherlands.
Hello.Text2: This year, I graduated from the Digital Design & Motion program at SintLucas in Eindhoven.
Hello.Text3: I am a hard worker and a true perfectionist when it comes to 3D work, because I always strive for the best result.
Hello.Text4: Not just for myself, but of course also for the client.

Work.Title: WORK
Work.Text1: I don't work in a team and do most of the work myself.
Work.Text2: The programs I use are Blender and Substance Painter for the 3D part.
Work.Text3: I also use Adobe Premiere Pro, Photoshop, After Effects and many more for my projects.
Work.Text4: I am open to working in many different styles, but focus most on realism.
Work.Text5: In my projects no AI is used, everything is really homemade!
